name: 葉賜旭
objective: 介紹近代控制系統應用與研究所需的基本知識以及數位控制系統的分析與設計方式。課程內容包括：狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、狀態變數回饋系統設計、最佳控制與強健控制、數位控制系統等。
schedule:
●Introduction
●Block Diagrams, Transfer functions, and State Diagrams
●Vector-Matrix Representation of State Equations
●State-Transition Matrix and Equation
●Similarity Transformation
●Controllability and Observability
●State Feedback Control
●Liapunov Stability Analysis
●Optimal Control, Robust Control and Adaptive Control
●Discrete-Time Control Systems
materials:
參考書籍：
●Automatic Control Systems, B. C. Kuo and F. Golnaraghi, WILEY.
●Modern Control Engineering, K. Ogata, Prentice-Hall.
●Discrete-Time Control Systems, K. Ogata, Prentice-Hall.
